string-array.name: help_search_fragment
string-array.item: The search is not case sensitive
Type in a word in the search box and click search
You can use the \'?\' character to substitute one character\n(m?nni would result in minni, mynni and munni)
You can use the \'*\' character to substitute 0 or more characters\n(m*nni would result in minni, misminni,myndminni,â€¦)
When using the \'*\' character you have to specify at least two other characters in the search
Go to the glossaries tab to restrict search to selected glossaries\n\n Go to the languages tab to restrict search to certain search- or target languages

string-array.name: help_glossary_fragment
string-array.item: By default all the glossaries are searched but the search can be restricted to one or more particular glossaries
Just tap one or more glossary to select or deselect it, the glossaries with a check mark on the left are selected
You can press the select all button to select all glossaries
The button to the right of some glossaries is a link to a description of the glossary
You have to select at least one glossary

string-array.name: help_language_fragment
string-array.item: By default the search searches in all languages
You can restrict the search to a particular search language by pressing the drop down list for the search language and selecting a language
You can only select one or all search languages
By default the search displays results in all languages
You can restrict the search to a particular target language by pressing the drop down list for the target language and selecting a language
You can only select one or all target languages

string-array.name: help_result_screen
string-array.item: The result screen displays the results from your search
The results are displayed like this:
The term is the name of the term
The language indicates what language the term is in
The glossary this term belongs to
By clicking the items in the result screen you can get more information on each search term, including translations, descriptions and synonyms

string-array.name: help_result_info_screen
string-array.item: 2) The glossary this term belongs to
3) Translations and all extra info contained in the glossary for this term is listed here.
If extra information exists for a particular translation it is listed right below it inside a light green box.
This can include description of the term, example of usage and so on.
If similar terms exist (synonyms) they are listed below the light green box.
